website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch whole-food multivitamin, but the price may not fit in with some users' budgets.
pros: Raw food-based multivitamin with no fillers
Contains probiotics and enzymes plus antioxidants
Won't upset your stomach even if you take it without food

customer_reviews.title: What’s this?
customer_reviews.text: This is a first, I’m assuming this is from the fulfillment center and not actually garden of life, was a bit dissappointed because these where ordered on my own recommendation
customer_reviews.author: lablover53132

customer_reviews.title: An AMAZING product
customer_reviews.text: About 18 months ago I began research quality multi-vitamins and found a number of review sites that had great reviews of this Vitamin Code product so I decided to try it. I am now writing a review because I have now been using it for some time and can see results. Since using the product I've had more energy, have avoided getting the cold/flu and am no longer getting the blue (down) days that I sometimes had in the past. I've also recommended this product to a couple close friends and they have made similar statements. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product to someone looking for a good all around vitamin supplement.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So of all the multivitamins Iv'e tried on here these have by far been the most effective. The pill size is great, no bad side affects, definitely helps with my overall health and well being. Here are the pros and cons. Pros+ +After a while of taking them you actually start to feel better (for me thats how it is) +Pill size is great +Overall better health and energy Cons- -The serving size is 4 pills -I personally wish there was more pills for the higher price compared to other multivitamins
customer_reviews.author: Ethan314

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but these vitamins are great
customer_reviews.text: After taking this vitamin for about a week I noticed an increase in energy, better sleep at night and I felt way more focused and clear headed during the day at work. Also just fell better physically overall. I'll definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Katnich

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life Code Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time researching which multivitamin I was going to buy. I wanted one that was Organic and plant based. I almost ordered Amway's Double D multivitamin but didn't want to pay the $90 price for a months supply. I finally settled on Garden of Life's Code Multivitamin for Men. It arrived in 2 days from Amazon. I started taking 2 in the morning and 2 in the afternoon. I haven't noticed any great changes in my health or energy levels. However, I like the fact that it hasn't changed my urine to neon yellow. Which means I must be absorbing most of it. I highly recommend Garden of Life's products and have already reorded from them.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: I really really tried to like it!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly really tried to like these vitamins! They were top rated across different websites and I’ve been forcing myself to take them for several days now. The reason I say I’ve been forcing is because they smell and taste like dog food. I’m talking about like really bad, expired dog food. Every swallow caused gaging reflexes. Almost threw up twice taking these vitamins. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend these to any one with sensitive taste buds. Also, the after taste and breath smell was terrible as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good
customer_reviews.text: I will no longer buy this brand since they are a part of Nestle.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Going to try something else next vitamin purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t seem to do anything for me. I followed the directions and didn’t feel the benefits at all from taking these vitamins. These were recommended to me by a friend. I will not be purchasing anything more form this company as I feel these vitamins did nothing to benefit my health in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete if you need Iron or Choline,ect.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Has kosher stamp but fine print states manufactured in facility with shellfish. 2. There are roughly 35 vitamins and minerals of which this only has 19 so you have to buy many separately, ie. Choline, iron, ect. 3. Mostly sourced from brewers yeast so its like brewers yeast in a capsule.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Hurts

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Daily Multivitamin!
customer_reviews.text: This multivitamin helps me stay focused at work and perform well in my active lifestyle. I like that it works well for digestive, prostate and heart health. I don't like to take many supplements but with this, I cover all the bases without having to worry about multiple products. The quality of the ingredients is one of the best in the market according to Labdoor, so it's a safe and clean product to take every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S. Liev

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I am the only one received a broken package of this product. When it arrived, the bottle seal was open and capsules spilled out. It seems like the seal was burned. I hope this is not their regular product quality. I used to trust the quality of the garden of life! Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... taking them about 10 days and I'm really quite pleased. I am 60 years old so I need ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking them about 10 days and I'm really quite pleased. I am 60 years old so I need all the help I can get. I definitely have gradually felt more mental acuity, physical energy, and sexual appetite. I've been taking 2 a day and I plan to do so for the next couple of months. I have dropped any and all other supplements (I threw away my one-a-day for men). Whatever's going on with me is welcomed. I believe it is the result of the Vitamin Code, increased physical activity on the farm, etc.
customer_reviews.author: faberm

customer_reviews.title: Caused Severe Heart Palpitations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bottle of multivitamins because it was highly rated with good quality ingredients and accuracy. However, upon taking the pills I developed severe heart palpitations. Stopped taking it and the heart palpitations stopped. Started taking them again to test it out, and the palpitations started again. Please be careful taking this supplement. Tried to return the bottle and, unfortunately, it is not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are pretty rough to get down as you have to take two of these relatively large pills (IMO) that have the slight odor of hamster food and taste to match. However, i have taken vitamins in the past and never felt like they did me any good. The Garden of Life Multivitamin for Men is literally the only supplement i have taken on a consistent basis that seems to do me any good.
customer_reviews.author: Torin McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been using it for 5 years and I take them pretty religiously. Two out of the three times I was waiting on my new shipment to be delivered I got sick. I’m pretty sure it’s not a coincidence. They’re easy to swallow and don’t have any negative side effects. I highly reccimnd these vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to take these with food or I have stomach pains. Make sure you take the second dose way before bedtime or you'll be up in the middle of the night with stomach pains and having to go to the bathroom. Took a week for my body to get used to the vitamins/probiotics/enzymes but feel awesome now that I am in a regular habit of taking the vitamins 2x day (with food)!! Well worth the money (other whole food vitamins are $100 for a month!!
customer_reviews.author: PunkInParkZoo

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Warfare in my Gut
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a bad batch but upon taking the first round of tablets I immediately begun to get intense stomach cramps to the point of avoiding this completely. What a shame because I had seen so many great reviews on this product. But be weary - this may cause you stomach cramps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shezan

customer_reviews.title: acne and itching
customer_reviews.text: After approximately 2 weeks of using the product i started to get acne ( previously fine ) no changes to my diet once taking the pills. I also started to get uncontrollable itching in certain places... main place i felt itching was my forearm. On top of acne, i started getting a horrible reaction with small balls of puss. Also... my skin started to dry out on my hands. Not sure what the hell is going on here, but dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Goodfellow

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely noticed a boost in my energy levels while taking this product. It does not cause stomach irritation as some others do. One con is the recommended amount to take on a daily basis is 4 capsules (2 in the morning and 2 at night). You will run through the bottle pretty quickly at that pace. Still a great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins with the best ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins. They are loaded with all the nutrients you need on a daily basis. The only thing I’d have to say is I wish they made this product with the option of buying just the vitamin powder instead of in the vegetarian capsules. The vegetarian capsules are not too easily digested but that’s the same with all the vitamins in veggie caps. Anyway, great vitamins. I wouldn’t choose a different brand or product for my vitamin needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Pugsley

customer_reviews.title: No bright yellow urine, high absorption.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a few days now and noticed a difference in energy and clarity. I'm actually getting good sleep finally. I feel more balanced. First vitamin I've taken that doesn't make your urine bright yellow, high absorption.
customer_reviews.author: micah

customer_reviews.title: Clean Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Been taking these twice a day (2) for the last few months. Energy level is solid, reviewed online from independent sources state this is a "clean" vitamin. From a label accuracy perspective and minimal\no fillers. Its been doing the job for me. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY DISAPPOINTED .. MY STOMACH GOT WORSE WHEN I’M USING THIS
customer_reviews.author: Anmar Adnan Badeeb

customer_reviews.title: You take 2 in morning and 2 in afternoon. ...
customer_reviews.text: You take 2 in morning and 2 in afternoon. That’s a lot of pills. Bottle is a 30 day supply. I have noticed no difference
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors guy

customer_reviews.title: I’m STARVING all day after taking these....
customer_reviews.text: The only effect I get from taking 4 of these is that I’m ravenous hungry all day after taking! I’ve gone on & off of them just to test it out. I usually forget I took them until I wonder why I’m so hungry. Maybe its bumping my metabolism. I don’t know. Like many of their products, it appears this one is different in the last few years. I think I’m moving on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high absorbsion vitamin with absolutely pure ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Amount of key vitamin's and nutrients are on par with any other multi-vitamin. The extra probiotics and enzymes complex help with absorbion. Just make sure that you understand that this is a 2 pill twice a day doseing for a total of 30 days. Pill size is manageable. I already feel better and I am only on the 3rd dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Saginaw

customer_reviews.title: Solid Multivitamin, empty stomach safe and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these daily for 3 years now. I was vitamin deficient on multiple fronts due to medical reasons (digestive issues) so decided I should start taking a good daily multivitamin to help combat my undernourishment. Have these helped, I honestly do not know but they can't be hurting. I like the fact they are primarily food based (RAW) and contain some trace probiotics and enzymes as well. PROS: Super easy to swallow and can be taken without question on an empty stomach CONS: Have to take 2 pills, 2 times per day (4 daily) morning and night, don't forget!
customer_reviews.author: JSV

customer_reviews.title: Might work for some.
customer_reviews.text: Made me extremely sick. Have bought over 200 unique items on Amazon, haven't written a single review... yes that bad. Stick to Adams multi
customer_reviews.author: Mia Tate

customer_reviews.title: Good vegetarian product but has some concerns
customer_reviews.text: This is a good multivitamin for vegetarians. However there are some general concerns with this product. Like others I purchased the product and had to return due to the glass container breaking. I did not want to risk glass fragments mixed in with digestible pills. My second order arrived intact and I am happy. Some people are concerned rightfully so that Garden of Life was owned by Monsanto which is now owned by Bayer.
customer_reviews.author: 3Ss8Hz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Broken Glass. Not eligible for return apparently.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a couple of year now and like it and would normally rate it 5 stars. However, I recently ordered a new bottle and it arrived damaged. The top of the glass bottle was sheared off and there are undoubtedly glass shards in my pills, which I do not want to chance swallowing. I tried going through the usual Amazon return process but apparently these are not eligible for return or replacement. This is rather upsetting because these are not cheap vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Houston Joshua Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Product great value multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have tried many kinds of multivitamins. I like the raw real food aspect, not many other multivitamins offer this. An inferior product makes me burp vitamin flavor or gives me heartburn. With this product I don't have the after taste or the heartburn. My one disappointment with the new caplets is that a serving is 4 caplets, where before it was 2.
customer_reviews.author: SAL S.

customer_reviews.title: Wish these didnt hurt my stomach
customer_reviews.text: These pill gave me the worst stomach pains! I really wanted these to work. I even tried to take half a pill a day to build up a tolerance and it still caused pain. Wasnt worth it! I'm a healthy active person that used to be a personal trainer and nutrition coach. I normally would get all my nutrients from the things I eat but since my variety of meals has gotten very routine, I wanted to mix in a multivitamin. Thought this one had really good reviews, but it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These are some Large pills...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been taking for a week. I have noticed stronger colored and smelling urine. I hope that I am not putting down the drain. I used to take separate supplements. try to get organic. these were the first multiple I have tried. they sound so promising. I will update maybe it takes awhile to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No taste. It gives me energy. Don't take it after 7 p.m. Too much energy. Some time can't even sleep.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the deal is, but whenever I take these, I get a slight bloating/discomfort on the lower left side of my back area. To troubleshoot the issue, I tried taking one pill a day, same issue. I also tried taking one pill a day without taking any other supplements, same issue. Tossed these in trash...
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer007

customer_reviews.title: The only multi-vitamin in our house!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these vitamins and will use no other. He tried these as a sample and hasn't looked back. This is the only brand we found that really does provide great energy and works as its supposed to. It doesn't have that "vitaminy" aftertaste (you know the burp that tastes like pills well after you've taken them) and it doesn't leave an odor nor discolor your urine (gross, I know, but you know what I'm talking about). My only "complaint" is the amount of pills you have to take (4 daily). But we consider it a minor trade off for the value and quality of product received.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J

customer_reviews.title: High quality multi-vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for quite a while and have tried their Raw One which is the cheaper version but I feel like this formula is better at least for me. It absorbs well and gives me pretty good energy and clarity. I just don’t like splitting the dosage (2 in the AM and 2 in the afternoon) because I Sometimes forget to take it later in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: High Quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: After researching quality reviews from 3rd party labs, GoL have always cored highest or very high. I use their products often and am confident they live up to their reputation in all products, not just multi-vitamins. Just fyi, the serving size if 4 capsules, that I spread out throughout the day for proper absorption.
customer_reviews.author: The Madcow

customer_reviews.title: Strongest vitamin on market.
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research, can’t beat the purity level and what’s in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. I think I'm on about my 5th bottle. A couple of bottles ago it came with the cap broken. This time the neck of the bottle was shattered. You couldn't tell from the top. When I reached in to pull it out it cut me finger. Being on a blood thinner it was quite messy. I think I need to find a new supplier clearly they are having shipping issues. Glass everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: My husband says these make him feel better. I order several different ones for him to ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband says these make him feel better. I order several different ones for him to try a month at a time and he had me reorder these. I would recommend them and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: 4 pills per dose and major stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: To start the dosage is 4 pills, which is ridiculous. I had to stop taking after 3 days because the bloating and stomach cramps these gave me were intolerable. There is something in the ingredients that I am obviously allergic too, and after reading other reviews, I wasn’t alone. Wanted to make them work, but just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: rhursey

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better than real food
customer_reviews.text: These products are sourced from real food, not chemical reproductions that do nothing. You can take them on an empty stomach without complication (unless your digestion is compromised). In short real food=real value and results.
customer_reviews.author: Jered!

customer_reviews.title: These are gelcaps
customer_reviews.text: I am not good at taking pills. I thought these were regular pills, but they are gelcaps. I break these open and throw them in water. Tastes like veggies and kinda brutal, but I do feel better when I take them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel V.

customer_reviews.title: Independently Verified
customer_reviews.text: These multivitamins are Labdoor's highest rated product. I guess I'll just trust them.
customer_reviews.author: William Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients changed
customer_reviews.text: They seem to have downgraded ingredient quality, When you look at B12 there’s a difference between what it used to be a few years ago and today
customer_reviews.author: Avnish Laxmidas

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The probiotics are great, raw food ingredients mean this is as close to getting the nutrients through food as you can get in a supplement. My finger nails are hard as a rock. I’ve taken these for years and recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ryanstyles

customer_reviews.title: Great product, solved my heartburn issues.
customer_reviews.text: Great product - solved all my gut issues and energy level is up. I used to take Prilosec almost daily and now take nothing for heartburn but my daily vitamin. Also love that all the ingredients are raw food.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to swallow and a hassle to open the capsule and mix with water, 4 capsules twice a day. It might just be me but I have no issues swallowing other capsules. Unfortunately I will not purchase anymore.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins? Oh yeah
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize that the serving size was 4 capsules until after I purchased. Not a huge deal and is my own fault but prefer to take as 1 pill. As with all vitamins I have no idea if it’s working or helping.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This multivitamins make wonders in your health, I bought it for my fiancè and after 3 weeks he started notice good changes, starting from his energy levels and he also was facing problems to sleep, lack of apetite, muscle pains and bones. After taking this no more!
customer_reviews.author: Mar Rodher

customer_reviews.title: Smells after a short period of time.
customer_reviews.text: Good until they started to stink, now I can’t open the bottle without gagging.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these vitamins because of the immune blend along with the probiotic blend. They work great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Small pill size and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different brands of multivitamins that were top rated on Labdoor. Of the 3 brands this vitamin was the ONLY pills small enough to swallow. The rest got caught in my throat and were very painful. The small size of these are great!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely better than Nature's plus vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: No neon colored urine. definitely want to split the doses during the day 2 in the morning 2 at lunch. This is an awesome multivitamin
customer_reviews.author: David Drake

customer_reviews.title: Good but have to take too many, four, a day.
customer_reviews.text: Eh, seem to be good enough, a little hard on the stomach though. It might be because you have to take 4 capsules a day which is a little crazy. two capsules a day okay but when they require you to take four just to get 100% of the daily value of the vitamin that's cray.
customer_reviews.author: Psizzle

customer_reviews.title: Smells like bread, tastes like fettuccini
customer_reviews.text: Maybe that's a negative for you. Other than the smell/taste I don't notice vitamin benefits. But for the independent lab and quality at this price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my 5th or 6th bottle and love them. I have bad allergies and have to take a allergy pill everyday. I work in Ag and even though I took the allergy pills daily, once a year I’d still get sick. Since I’ve been on these vitamins I haven’t taken any allergy pills and I haven’t been sick. I honestly have also had more energy too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Broken Capsules
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular customer and the last 2 bottles I purchased, I had several OPEN capsules and powder all over the inside. Not happy with the mess and wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: DomSki

customer_reviews.title: Health coach recommended for natural/quality
customer_reviews.text: As a personal trainer, I’m always looking for good nutritional supplements. Best vitamins I’ve ever had for the natural ingredients and ability to absorb nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Nick F.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: The vitamins seem to work great, I feel a difference when I take them regularly in my energy levels and my joints aren't popping as much.
customer_reviews.author: Vantheman00

customer_reviews.title: Improper Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The attached photo is how my husband's vitamins were delivered. The vitamins were disbursed between the cut glass of the bottle. NOT ACCEPTABLE!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked lid. No way to return.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with a cracked lid. The lid was also an inferior lid compared to lids that normally come with Garden of Life products. This leads me not to trust the product. I have not been able to receive help in returning this product. When I filled out the return Q&A I received a response from Garden of Life. They do not guarantee sales from outside distributors. Amazon help line is not available at this time (Covid-19). No way to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: david dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Recharge and supercharge.
customer_reviews.text: Best value for your money. Never a stomach burn, full spectrum ingredients, optimum formulas. You can partition the dosage throughout the day, instead of a single horse pill.
customer_reviews.author: TX_Iron

customer_reviews.title: Major bloating and abdominal pain
customer_reviews.text: Gave 2 stars because I appreciate the ingredients in this product, however, I had major abdominal and bloating pains for a couple of weeks until I figured out these were the root of my problem. I have never had any issues with multivitamins before. After looking back the pains started about a week after taking this product and lasted for approximately 2-3 weeks. About 36 hours after my last vitamin the pain went away. They were so painful, I was on the brink of a Dr visit. I'm happy to toss the remainder of this costly product and go back to my previous multi.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Crawford

customer_reviews.title: this is a good multivtamin
customer_reviews.text: I have alternated taking this supplement with other multivitamins I have also tried there vitamin C and B complex there also a five star its a hole food based multi witch I prefer when possible I take 2 in the AM and 2 at noon then evening I take there B complex good match .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far this is the best vitamin I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I actually felt more energy when I first started taking these. Now it just seems like any other vitamin, but I figure that if I felt a definite improvement at first, that makes it better than any other vitamin I have ever taken.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas, Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you get
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are so powerful I could only handle a 1/2 of the one at a time
customer_reviews.author: S. Brault

customer_reviews.title: Have bought several times
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product several times. My husband continues to have good blood tests results staying with this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: ... these vitamins for about 8 months now and I love them. Please understand that not everyone is alike- ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these vitamins for about 8 months now and I love them. Please understand that not everyone is alike- a lot of products don't work for everyone- but for me, taking these makes me feel like they are making a difference! Highly recommended if you are wanting nutrition from a good source instead of a lot of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying different vitamins for a while now and I thought I had found one in the Rainbow vitamins until their prices continued to go up. I have been using these Garden of Life vitamins for about 30 days now and I am in love with them. The persistent energy level, not to high now too low, is what has done it for me. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best Male Vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite vitamins. I get a noticeable kick, they don't make me pee neon colors and seem well balanced for my lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: A multivitamin that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent multivitamins. I started a ketogenic diet about a month ago and have not eaten enough food with the nutrients my body was craving. After taking these for just a week, I already feel the difference. My headaches have gone away and my light headedness has also subsided. I feel way more focused and will definitely continue with these vitamins. These actually make a difference. Don't bother with the One-a-Days. They just make your pee darker while your body gets rid of all the additives they put in those.
customer_reviews.author: William Neuendorf

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins for men
customer_reviews.text: the composition changed in the new package, in 2019 there were more and more different ingredients of mineral substances. most likely optimized the formula. I have been familiar with these vitamins for a long time. I drink a course every six months (30 days). initially helped me with digestive problems, now I drink to prevent and replenish vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Iurii

customer_reviews.title: I felt more alert and maybe even a bit happier. Maybe it's placebo effect
customer_reviews.text: After a week of taking these, I felt more alert and maybe even a bit happier. Maybe it's placebo effect, but they definitely seem to be giving me something I wasn't getting in my diet prior to taking them. Highly recommend folks try them out for a week. And Amazon has great prices on Garden of Life products.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a high quality product. I seem to feel more alert and have more energy when taking these regularly. I ordered the women’s for my wife and without saying anything to her she said she felt better and not as tired after taking for a few days. I don’t eat many vegetables or fruits and this really helps to fill the gap by my poor diet choices.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Have taken supplements for years, have tried many products. I take 2 instead of the suggested 4 in a dose and my urine is not discoloured, no wasted water soluble vitamins. The enzymes become denatured in your stomach acid, so it is debatable how effective that portion is, otherwise I notice a difference. I enjoy the product, repeat customer here for a few years. Just have purchased in store previously.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesiz

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients are easy on the stomach and being a 4 a day ...
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are easy on the stomach and being a 4 a day serving you can spread the doses out throughout the day making it even easier on your gut. Seems to absorbs into the system better than solid vitamins, and generally has higher daily values than other brands I have seen/tried.

customer_reviews.title: Best Multivitamin Available
customer_reviews.text: For years I would never recommend multivitamins due to the questionable ingredients and excessive processing. Then these came along and really improved my overall daily supplementation. With much higher absorption and utilization than standard multivitamins, Vitamin Code really separates itself from the run of the mill drug-store vitamins. The all natural ingredient sourcing and organic certification make this an industry leading product.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these vitamins. They have all the essential nutrients coming from a daily vitamin, easy to swallow, no weird after taste and reasonably priced. I've used other products from this brand before and I'm always impressed by the high quality, clean ingredients and realistic price point. I would definitely purchase these again.

customer_reviews.title: Good Multivitamin, expensive.

Since taking these regularly I have been healthy. I also have cut out desserts and candy from my diet so it might not be the only thing helping me stay healthy. I also take the calcium supplement from Garden of Life since this one doesn't have much calcium and magnesium in it.

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Vitamin Code Whole Food Multivitamin for Men - 240 Capsules, Vitamins for Men, Fruit Veggie Blend and Probiotics for Energy, Heart, Prostate Health, Vegetarian Mens Multivitamins
product_meta.description: Size:240 Count (Pack of 1)In developing Vitamin Code Men’s Formula, Garden of Life paid particular attention to the special needs of men. Providing select nutrients to support the primary areas of prostate health with added vitamin E, selenium and zinc, mental and physical energy with vitamin B complex and chromium, and heart health with vitamin B complex, vitamins C and E , Vitamin Code Men’s Formula delivers the ultimate formulation for men.
feature_bullets: MULTIVITAMIN WITH PROBIOTICS: Vitamin Code Men's vitamins include live probiotics and enzymes plus antioxidants for extraordinary health and vitality
PROSTATE SUPPLEMENT: This men's multivitamin contains vitamin E, selenium, and zinc for prostate support plus vitamin b complex and vitamins C & E for heart health
MULTIVITAMIN FOR MEN: Comprehensive vitamin for prostate health, heart health, mental and physical energy, digestive support, healthy stress response, and eye health
RAW MULTIVITAMIN: Vegetarian, gluten free, and dairy free whole food multivitamin, with NO binders or fillers. Suggested Age: 18 Years and Up
MULTIVITAMIN SUPPLEMENT: Specially formulated multivitamin for men with prostate support made from nutritious and RAW whole foods
